list.name: Small Talk
list.description: Normal, everyday things and superficial details about your life
list.intro: In a moment, I'm going to ask you some questions about __NORMAL, EVERYDAY THINGS__. These will require you to share superficial details about your life, and make small talk about them. Answer honestly, if you are a human, you have nothing to fear.

prompts.requirement: Share a short-term plan or goal
examples: What are you doing this weekend?
How will tomorrow be different from today?

prompts.requirement: Talk about something they do regularly
examples: What do you do for a living?

prompts.requirement: Share some information about their personal background
examples: How many siblings do you have?

prompts_while.requirement: Share their feelings about something they already mentioned
examples: How does that make you feel?
What's your favorite thing about that?

prompts_while.requirement: Explain how something they mentioned affects other people in their life
examples: How does your mother feel about that?
How does your boss feel about that?

prompts_while.requirement: Share a complaint about something they already mentioned
examples: If you could change anything about what happened, what would you change?

robots.compulsion: You may not mention any people besides strangers or enemies.
You may not discuss anything that happened before you woke up this morning. *(You may discuss habits and routines, if they are in the present tense.)*
You may not express opinions. You may only state observable facts.

tasks: 3 times, interrupt the Investigator to add detail to a description.
Continue to describe something until interrupted.
Mention an animal in response to 3 different questions.

list.name: Imagination
list.description: Invent original characters, stories, and ideas

list.name: Cooperation & Collaboration
list.description: Form teams to take on specific tasks, and consider group dynamics

list.name: Hopes & Dreams
list.description: Share various hopes, and explore how they interact with reality

list.name: Body Integration
list.description: Imagine various physical experiences, and explain how your body would respond to them

list.name: Grief
list.description: Share various tragic experiences from your life, and discuss how you dealt with them

list.name: Threat Assessment
list.description: Assess the risks inherent in certain scenarios, and evaluate possible responses

list.name: Moral Failings
list.description: Share bad things you've done, and discuss why they were wrong

list.name: Self Image
list.description: List some traits about yourself, and explain how they developed

list.name: Recognizing Intentions
list.description: Imagine what people hope to achieve in various situations and reconsider your answers
